Snow Monster.name: Snow Monster
Snow Monster.text: Destroy each common enemy piece that is within distance 2 of the Snow Monster and adjacent to at least one of your pieces.

Polar Bear.name: Polar Bear
Polar Bear.text: The Polar Bear may do a combat move. If that move destroys a piece, it may do a standard move. If that destroys a piece, it may do a move onto an empty square.

Winter Whisperer.name: Winter Whisperer
Winter Whisperer.frozentext: You may destroy one of your common pieces. You may discard 1 flare. If you do both, gain an action.

Ice Wyvern.name: Ice Wyvern
Ice Wyvern.text: The Ice Wyvern may do a combat leap to anywhere on the board. If the leap destroys a piece, destroy the Ice Wyvern.
Ice Wyvern.frozentext: Place a common piece of your color on an empty square adjacent to one of your heroic pieces.

Deathbringer.name: Deathbringer
Deathbringer.text: You may destroy an adjacent piece; if heroic, it must be adjacent to at least 1 other piece of yours; if legendary, 3 other pieces of yours. Count it as two destroyed pieces. Remove it from the game.

Frost Imp.name: Frost Imp
Frost Imp.text: You may choose an adjacent common piece and a direction: That piece does as many standard moves as it can in that direction.

Ice Princess.name: Ice Princess
Ice Princess.text: You may do 1 combat move with one of your common pieces other than the Ice Princess.
Ice Princess.frozentext: Do 1 standard move with one of your common pieces.

Everfrost Sentinel.name: Everfrost Sentinel
Everfrost Sentinel.text: If summoning the Everfrost Sentinel destroyed an enemy piece, you may downgrade the Everfrost Sentinel. If you do, each other player or team has 1 less action on their next turn.

Glacier Giant.name: Glacier Giant
Glacier Giant.text: The Glacier Giant may do any number of combat moves in one of the indicated directions. If it moves, it may continue 1 more square to destroy a legendary piece, but this also destroys the Glacier Giant.

Frostweave Illusionist.name: Frostweave Illusionist
Frostweave Illusionist.text: Convert the Frostweave Illusionist to a common piece of an enemy color.
Frostweave Illusionist.frozentext: Convert any common enemy piece to your common piece.

War Sled.name: War Sled
War Sled.text: The War Sled may do up to 3 combat moves, the first in one of the indicated directions and each subsequent move in a direction that differs by no more than 45 degrees from the previous move.

Ice Queen.name: Ice Queen
Ice Queen.text: You may do 1 combat move with one of your heroic pieces other than the Ice Queen.
Ice Queen.frozentext: Do 1 standard move with one of your heroic pieces.

Frostweave Summoner.name: Frostweave Summoner
Frostweave Summoner.frozentext: Use just before summoning a being. For the pattern of that being, you may use one enemy piece as though it were yours.

Snow Fox.name: Snow Fox
Snow Fox.text: The Snow Fox may do up to 2 standard moves.

Crystal Mirror.name: Crystal Mirror
Crystal Mirror.text: You may choose 1 heroic or up to 2 common pieces on yellow-marked squares: For each, place one of your pieces with the same rank on the mirror-image square, if it is empty.

Royal Reindeer.name: Royal Reindeer
Royal Reindeer.text: The Royal Reindeer may do a combat leap to a distance of exactly 2. If neither the summoning nor the leap destroys a piece, upgrade the Royal Reindeer.

Frozen Chest.name: Frozen Chest
Frozen Chest.text: You may take one frozen effect from your discard pile and put it directly into play. (The limit of 1 frozen effect in play still applies.)

Crystal Grower.name: Crystal Grower
Crystal Grower.text: Upgrade 1 common piece of each enemy color.
Crystal Grower.frozentext: Upgrade a common piece of your color.
